translation.en: [woman] Roy!
translation.ja: ロイ

translation.en: Roy!
translation.ja: ロイ！

translation.en: [woman] I just want to--
translation.ja: 私はただ…

translation.en: [man] Just all day and all night, you've been riding me.
translation.ja: １９３８年インディアナ州エバンズビル 朝から晩までお前は小言ばかりだ

translation.en: -[woman] Don't get upset I-- -[man] Don't get upset when you wake me--
translation.ja: １９３８年インディアナ州エバンズビル 怒らないで 怒らないで 何だって？

translation.en: -[woman] I don't like when you-- -[man] I don't care who hears anything.
translation.ja: 誰に聞かれても構わない

translation.en: -[man] Come here! -[slaps]
translation.ja: 来い！

translation.en: I made something for you.
translation.ja: ママのために作った

translation.en: [reporter] People gather by the thousands
translation.ja: ケネディ大統領の就任式に大勢の人が集まっています

translation.en: to witness the inauguration of John Fitzgerald Kennedy.
translation.ja: ケネディ大統領の就任式に大勢の人が集まっています ケネディ大統領の就任式に大勢の人が集まっています １９６１年ニューヨーク １９６１年ニューヨーク

translation.en: As the motorcade makes its way down Pennsylvania Avenue,
translation.ja: １９６１年ニューヨーク 人々の熱い視線の先にいるのは

translation.en: they hope to catch a glimpse of First Lady Jackie Kennedy
translation.ja: １９６１年ニューヨーク パレード車のジャクリーン夫人 パレード車のジャクリーン夫人

translation.en: in a dress by designer Oleg Cassini
translation.ja: オレグカッシーニのドレスに身を包み

translation.en: and a simple yet elegant pillbox by hatmaker Mr. Halston.
translation.ja: オレグカッシーニのドレスに身を包み 頭にはホルストンのピルボックス帽

translation.en: Did they just say your name?
translation.ja: 君が作った帽子？

translation.en: Excuse me. Morning. Good morning.
translation.ja: 失礼 おはよう

translation.en: [salesman] Elegance, if you will.
translation.ja: 上品ですよ

translation.en: I think madam will be really pleased.
translation.ja: お気に召すと思います

translation.en: What the hell is going on?
translation.ja: 一体どうなってる？

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.ja: 何かって？

translation.en: Ah, so Jacqueline Kennedy dropped your name for one.
translation.ja: ジャクリーン夫人の宣伝効果で

translation.en: We've sold 50 already, and it's not even 10:00 a.m.
translation.ja: 10時前なのに50個も売れました

translation.en: You're him, aren't you?
translation.ja: まさか　ウソみたい

translation.en: You're Mr. Halston. [gasps]
translation.ja: ホルストンさん

translation.en: God bless Jackie Kennedy.
translation.ja: ジャクリーン夫人 万歳

translation.en: [Halston] Fuck Jackie Kennedy.
translation.ja: くそババア

translation.en: Halston! Why would you say that after all she's been through?
translation.ja: 大統領夫人に何てこと言うの？ 大統領夫人に何てこと言うの？ １９６８年

translation.en: She made you, Halston.
translation.ja: １９６８年 彼女のおかげで名が売れた

translation.en: And then she killed me.
translation.ja: そして潰された

translation.en: Stopped wearing hats so she wouldn't ruin that awful gigantic hairdo of hers.
translation.ja: アホみたいな髪型に変えて帽子をかぶらなくなった

translation.en: Do you have a moment?
translation.ja: 話せるか？

translation.en: I'm sorry. As you can see, we're terribly busy.
translation.ja: 見て分かるとおり大忙しなんだ

translation.en: [man] Halston, the second-quarter report came in.
translation.ja: 第２四半期の決算が出た

translation.en: -It's not good. -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: 業績は不振だ

translation.en: Hat sales are down 30% from last quarter, and the previous quarter down 40%.
translation.ja: 前期から30％その前からは40％も落ちてる

translation.en: -We're trending up, is what you're saying. -No, that is not what I'm saying.
translation.ja: 10％回復してる 真面目に聞け

translation.en: You know what they say. Numbers.
translation.ja: 数字なんかどうでもいい

translation.en: Who says that?
translation.ja: 誰が言った？

translation.en: Oh, everybody. All the time.
translation.ja: 皆 そう言ってる

translation.en: People just don't wear hats anymore is the problem.
translation.ja: 帽子をかぶる人が少なくなった

translation.en: Yes. As a milliner, Henry, I'm well aware of that fact.
translation.ja: 僕は帽子職人だそれには気付いてる

translation.en: Well, what I mean is, what are you going to do about it?
translation.ja: 聞きたいのは今後の戦略だ

translation.en: Well, I'm hard at work making the sun brighter,
translation.ja: もちろん考えてはいるが

translation.en: but until I get my rainmaking machine working, I don't know what I'll do, Henry.
translation.ja: 先行きが見えない状況じゃ何も決められない

translation.en: Except maybe drink after this meeting.
translation.ja: 今夜 飲むのは決めてる

translation.en: From the gentleman at the end.
translation.ja: 奥の紳士から

translation.en: He sent it back.
translation.ja: 返されました

translation.en: What is it about an amaretto stone sour that you don't like?
translation.ja: アマレット･ストーン･サワーは嫌いか？

translation.en: It's the stone, isn't it? Choking hazard. I'll have the barman remove it.
translation.ja: 種が嫌なら頼んで取ってもらおう

translation.en: No, thank you.
translation.ja: 遠慮する

translation.en: -Then let me buy you something else. -No, thanks.
translation.ja: 他の物でもいい 結構

translation.en: I don't accept drinks from strangers.
translation.ja: あなたを知らない

translation.en: Then tell me your name. We won't be strangers.
translation.ja: 名前は？　知り合いになろう

translation.en: You go first.
translation.ja: 先にどうぞ

translation.en: -Eric. -And what do you do, Eric?
translation.ja: エリック 仕事は何を？

translation.en: I'm a falconer.
translation.ja: タカ使いだ

translation.en: Bullshit.
translation.ja: ウソつけ

translation.en: We're heroes, really, my falcon and I. Keeping the rat population under control.
translation.ja: 僕たちはヒーローだ街のネズミの数を調整してる

translation.en: It's very fashionable, what we do.
translation.ja: それに しゃれてる

translation.en: That long leather glove, that little cap I put over his head. It's kinky.
translation.ja: 僕は革の手袋をして相棒には帽子をかぶせる

translation.en: Let me buy you a drink.
translation.ja: おごらせてくれ

translation.en: Can I ask what is it about me that caught your eye?
translation.ja: 教えてくれ どうして僕が目に留まった？

translation.en: How do you mean?
translation.ja: なぜ聞く？

translation.en: I mean, why are you trying to pick me up and not anybody else?
translation.ja: 他の誰でもなく僕を選んだ理由は？

translation.en: I'm not like anybody else.
translation.ja: 君しか見えてない

translation.en: Just wouldn't have thought I was your type.
translation.ja: タイプじゃないかと

translation.en: And what's my type?
translation.ja: 僕のタイプは？

translation.en: A white guy in a Brooks Brothers suit.
translation.ja: 気取ったスーツの白人

translation.en: Ouch.
translation.ja: ひどいな

translation.en: Or… maybe you're just a size queen.
translation.ja: それか ナニのデカさ重視

translation.en: Or…
translation.ja: または

translation.en: maybe I've been an outsider, too, my whole life.
translation.ja: 君と同じアウトサイダーかも

translation.en: Getting sideways glances from white guys in Brooks Brothers suits
translation.ja: スーツ姿の白人男に横目で見られ

translation.en: for what I was and who I liked or who I was and what I liked.
translation.ja: 本当の自分をひたすら隠し続けてきた

translation.en: Till one day, I just stopped giving a flying fuck.
translation.ja: でも今は気にするのをやめた

translation.en: Ed.
translation.ja: エドだ

translation.en: Ed is my name.
translation.ja: 僕はエド

translation.en: Nice meeting you, Eric.
translation.ja: 会えてよかった

translation.en: Though Eric's not your real name, is it?
translation.ja: エリックは偽名だろ？

translation.en: Roy.
translation.ja: ロイ

translation.en: Though that's not my real name either.
translation.ja: それも本名じゃない

translation.en: I like people to call me Halston.
translation.ja: 皆はホルストンと呼ぶ

translation.en: Get the fuck out.
translation.ja: ウソだろ

translation.en: The hat designer?
translation.ja: 帽子デザイナー？

translation.en: I've always wondered this. How does somebody end up designing hats?
translation.ja: なぜ帽子のデザイナーなんかに？

translation.en: It's sculpture, really.
translation.ja: 彫刻に似てる

translation.en: I've always done it. I made hats to lift my mother's spirits.
translation.ja: 小さい頃から母親のために作ってた

translation.en: Oh, honey.
translation.ja: ロイ

translation.en: You are far too special for this place.
translation.ja: すごいわ こんな田舎にいちゃいけない

translation.en: [Halston] I had a magical childhood.
translation.ja: いい子供時代だった

translation.en: But I left Indiana as soon as I could. First to Chicago and then here.
translation.ja: まずはシカゴそしてニューヨークに来て

translation.en: Made myself out of nothing.
translation.ja: ゼロから築き上げた

translation.en: Whole cloth, as it were.
translation.ja: 生地１枚からね

translation.en: Men like us…
translation.ja: 僕たちは同じ

translation.en: come here from some faraway place to invent ourselves.
translation.ja: 故郷を離れ 成功を夢見て

translation.en: Make something out of nothing.
translation.ja: この街に来てる

translation.en: I didn't come from as far. Just crossed the river from New Jersey, but…
translation.ja: 僕の故郷はニュージャージーだけど

translation.en: That version of me seems very far away.
translation.ja: はるか遠くに感じる

translation.en: So, what are you going to do now?
translation.ja: これからどうする？

translation.en: Women don't wear hats anymore.
translation.ja: 帽子は流行遅れだ

translation.en: Well, Ed, I have a plan.
translation.ja: いい計画がある

translation.en: Have you ever heard of Ralph Lifshitz?
translation.ja: ラルフ･リフシッツだ

translation.en: [Ed] Who?
translation.ja: 誰？ 〝ブルーミングデールズ〞

translation.en: [Halston] Recently, Ralph Lifshitz walks into Bloomingdale's
translation.ja: 〝ブルーミングデールズ〞 〝ブルーミングデールズ〞 ラルフはブルーミングデールズへ行き ラルフはブルーミングデールズへ行き

translation.en: with a line of ties one inch wider than any other tie being sold
translation.ja: 店頭にあるネクタイより３センチ太い物を売り込んだ

translation.en: and a label that says "Polo."
translation.ja: ブランド名は“ポロ”

translation.en: They said, "If you make them one inch narrower
translation.ja: 店側は“あと３センチ細くすれば”

translation.en: and you swap your label for ours, we'll sell them."
translation.ja: “タグを付け替えて売ってもいい”と

translation.en: [Halston] He said no.
translation.ja: ラルフは断った

translation.en: And he walked out of there. And then two weeks later,
translation.ja: 彼が去った後 ２週間経って店が考えを変えたんだ

translation.en: Bloomingdale's, they come back to the table.
translation.ja: ２週間経って店が考えを変えたんだ

translation.en: They say, "We made a mistake."
translation.ja: “悪かった”

translation.en: [Halston] "We love your ties. We're haunted by them."
translation.ja: “君のネクタイが忘れられない”

translation.en: "You can keep your label. You can keep them one inch wider."
translation.ja: “太さもタグも変えなくていい”

translation.en: "And we want you to make shirts to go with them."
translation.ja: “タイに合わせたシャツも作ってくれ”と

translation.en: I've been designing hats for Bergdorf's since 1961.
translation.ja: 僕は1961年から帽子をデザインして

translation.en: I put that fucking place on the map.
translation.ja: バーグドルフを有名にした

translation.en: I'm gonna do what Ralph Lifshitz did, only bigger.
translation.ja: ラルフと同じ作戦でいく

translation.en: Why don't I know this name?
translation.ja: 誰なんだ？

translation.en: Because he changed his last name to fucking Lauren.
translation.ja: “ラルフ･ローレン”と言えば分かるか？

translation.en: I have a vision, Ed.
translation.ja: うまくいく

translation.en: [man] So, a store within a store?
translation.ja: 店の中に店を作る？

translation.en: [Halston] See? Simple.
translation.ja: 簡単だろ？

translation.en: But to sell what?
translation.ja: 何を売る？

translation.en: Halston.
translation.ja: ホルストン

translation.en: I wanna be the first person who's also a complete line.
translation.ja: 全アイテムをそろえたブランドを作る

translation.en: Women will come to me,
translation.ja: 僕のサロンで——

translation.en: and I will provide them a complete, custom couture experience.
translation.ja: 顧客の女性を全身コーディネートする

translation.en: I'll put her in Halston, head to toe.
translation.ja: 上から下までホルストン

translation.en: Dress, bra, panties, hose, shoes--
translation.ja: ドレス ブラ パンティ 靴

translation.en: I don't know, Halston.
translation.ja: それはどうかな

translation.en: No one wants European knockoffs anymore.
translation.ja: ヨーロッパのコピー品はもう売れない

translation.en: What if Bergdorf Goodman could house the first American couturier?
translation.ja: 史上初のアメリカ人デザイナーを 店に置きたくないか？

translation.en: -You? -No.
translation.ja: 君か？ 違う

translation.en: Halston.
translation.ja: ホルストン

translation.en: Which is me.
translation.ja: つまり僕

translation.en: It's interesting.
translation.ja: 面白い

translation.en: Why don't you start by making us some dresses?
translation.ja: まずはドレスを作ってみてくれ

translation.en: [Ed] Okay, so then what happened? How many did you sell?
translation.ja: それで どのくらい売れた？

translation.en: Well, you won't believe it.
translation.ja: 驚くと思うよ

translation.en: It was an unmitigated disaster. No sales. Total flop.
translation.ja: １着も売れてない正真正銘の大失敗だ

translation.en: Oh my God. I'm so sorry. Are you okay?
translation.ja: 残念だったな　大丈夫？

translation.en: I'm fine. What do you mean? I was brilliant. They're the dummies.
translation.ja: ドレスは最高だった悪いのは客の方だ

translation.en: Let me freshen you up.
translation.ja: 飲み物を

translation.en: -But what are you gonna do? -Keep going.
translation.ja: どうするんだ？ 続ける

translation.en: The show didn't work. That's fine. I know what I have to do.
translation.ja: 失敗してやることが分かった

translation.en: And what is that?
translation.ja: やることって？

translation.en: I'm too big for that room.
translation.ja: あの店は小さい

translation.en: I need to get out on my own.
translation.ja: 独立する

translation.en: You are fucking impressive, man.
translation.ja: 君は本当にすごい男だな

translation.en: I mean, here's the thing though. I know you love "yes" people.
translation.ja: 聞いてくれ 君はイエスマンが好きだ

translation.en: And I got a lot more syllables up my sleeve than just yes.
translation.ja: 僕も今まで散々こらえてきた

translation.en: Try me. Tell me something you think I won't like.
translation.ja: 僕が嫌がることを言ってみて

translation.en: Okay, fine.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: That collection you did for Bergdorf's? Looked like cement.
translation.ja: 君のコレクションはまるでセメント

translation.en: That's why they didn't sell. Nobody wanted 'em.
translation.ja: だから売れなかった

translation.en: Nobody understood them.
translation.ja: 理解されない

translation.en: You don't want to understand a dress. You want to love it.
translation.ja: 大事なのは愛されることだろ？

translation.en: You want to be Balenciaga. There's already a Balenciaga.
translation.ja: バレンシアガのまねじゃ意味がない

translation.en: What we need is to figure out your signature.
translation.ja: 独自のスタイルを作らないと

translation.en: What's gonna make me see some gorgeous woman
translation.ja: ゴージャスな女性がナイトクラブに入っていく

translation.en: out in a supper club wearing a fabulous ensemble
translation.ja: 美しい姿を見た人がこう言うんだ

translation.en: and say, "That's a Halston."
translation.ja: “ホルストンの服？”と

translation.en: So, does that mean you're in?
translation.ja: つまり“イエス”ってこと？

translation.en: Good evening.
translation.ja: こんばんは

translation.en: I have to tell you I have a problem sometimes.
translation.ja: 時々 困ったことがあるの

translation.en: And that's my name.
translation.ja: 名前のせいよ

translation.en: For instance, someone might come up to me and say, "Hello, Lisa. How are you?"
translation.ja: 街で会った人が“リサ 調子はどう？”

translation.en: And I'll say, "I'm fine, thank you, but it's Liza. It has a 'Z' in it."
translation.ja: 私は“元気よ ありがとう”と “でもリサじゃなくライザ”

translation.en: Or someone might say, "Lisa, what a nice hat you have on."
translation.ja: こんな時もある“リサ すてきな帽子だね”

translation.en: And I'll say, "Thank you very much, but my name is Liza." -[man] Liza! -"And that's my hair."
translation.ja: “私はライザだし帽子じゃなくて髪の毛”

translation.en: -Brava! -[woman] Wonderful!
translation.ja: ブラボー！

translation.en: -Liza! -[Liza] Hm?
translation.ja: ライザ

translation.en: Meet Halston.
translation.ja: ホルストンだ

translation.en: Yeah, I saw you out there.
translation.ja: 会場で見たわ

translation.en: Everyone else is going berserk,
translation.ja: 皆 盛り上がってたのに

translation.en: and you are sitting there like you're in a Dutch Masters painting.
translation.ja: あなたはしかめっ面で座ってた

translation.en: If I'm honest, I was a little distracted by the Buster Brown getup.
translation.ja: 君の服が気になって集中できなかった

translation.en: I think you need a new look.
translation.ja: イメチェンが必要だ

translation.en: [Liza] Oh.
translation.ja: あら

translation.en: -I love him already. [chuckles] -I knew you would.
translation.ja: 彼 好き だと思ったよ

translation.en: [Halston] Exactly. The collection was a disaster, and I knew it.
translation.ja: 初めてのコレクションは失敗だった

translation.en: So I decided to throw it all away.
translation.ja: だから全部 捨てた

translation.en: I left Bergdorf's and destroyed my life, basically.
translation.ja: バーグドルフを出て人生をぶち壊した

translation.en: No. No, you can't think of it like that.
translation.ja: ダメ　そんな風に考えないで

translation.en: You didn't throw anything away. You just gave yourself an enormous gift.
translation.ja: 何も捨ててないし得るものしかない

translation.en: You left everything you knew behind, which means
translation.ja: 過去は置いてきたから

translation.en: you are open to inspiration.
translation.ja: 新しいことを吸収できる

translation.en: And inspiration is going to find you.
translation.ja: 刺激的な未来が待ってるわ

translation.en: You know what?
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: That pillbox hat that Jackie wore? That is your Judy Garland.
translation.ja: ジャクリーン夫人の帽子は あなたのジュディ･ガーランド

translation.en: You and me are living under the shadow of something, and we're both trying to do the same thing.
translation.ja: 私たちは日陰で生きるのが嫌になった者同士よ

translation.en: We're walking away. Saying, "No. I wanna be taken seriously on my own."
translation.ja: 自分の実力で勝負したくて古巣を去った

translation.en: I'm--
translation.ja: つまり

translation.en: I… I don't wanna be just Judy Garland's daughter.
translation.ja: 私は“ジュディの娘”でいたくない

translation.en: Like you don't wanna just be Jackie O's hatmaker.
translation.ja: “帽子の人”は嫌でしょ？

translation.en: Why are you dressing like a little girl?
translation.ja: じゃあ なぜこの服を？

translation.en: Okay, see? Exactly. Why do I do that?
translation.ja: 言えてる　不思議よね

translation.en: I mean, it's cute, sure, but it's not you. I don't think.
translation.ja: かわいいけど君の魅力が生かせてない

translation.en: You're a woman. You should be dressed like one. [Liza] Mmm.
translation.ja: 大人の女性らしい服を着ないと

translation.en: And I suppose you're just the fella to help.
translation.ja: あなたは私の救世主？

translation.en: Yes, I think I am.
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: ♪ Early dawning ♪ ♪ Sunday morning ♪
translation.ja: “５番街24丁目”

translation.en: Let's lose the bra and panties.
translation.ja: ブラとパンティを外して

translation.en: Halston, are you getting fresh with me?
translation.ja: ホルストン私を抱こうとしてる？

translation.en: -Hardly. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: あり得ない

translation.en: Now, hold this. That's your neck there.
translation.ja: 持ってて　首元はこの位置だ

translation.en: Now…
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: -[Halston] Ready? -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: いくぞ

translation.en: There, now.
translation.ja: いいぞ

translation.en: That's a Halston.
translation.ja: “ホルストン”だ

translation.en: Oh my God! [laughs]
translation.ja: 驚いた

translation.en: Oh! Halston, you're a genius.
translation.ja: ホルストン　あなたって天才

translation.en: Oh my.
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.ja: きれいだ

translation.en: [Halston] This place will be your blank canvas. Third floor is the sewing room.
translation.ja: ここが新しい事務所３階は裁縫室だ

translation.en: All state of the art like Balenciaga in Paris.
translation.ja: バレンシアガのサロン並みに最新式だ

translation.en: And this will be the lounge.
translation.ja: ここは待合室

translation.en: And in here will be the salon where it's all really gonna happen.
translation.ja: ここがサロンデザインを考える場所だ

translation.en: I wanna create a new kind of experience.
translation.ja: 斬新な空間を作りたい

translation.en: I want women to come here
translation.ja: ここに来た人が

translation.en: and feel like they've been transported to a different world.
translation.ja: 異世界に迷い込んだ感覚になるんだ

translation.en: What sort of design are you picturing?
translation.ja: デザインのイメージは？

translation.en: Well, you know, Halston, rich, textural, cool.
translation.ja: ホルストンらしくゴージャスでクール

translation.en: Like Shangri-La on the Upper East Side.
translation.ja: アッパーイーストの高級ホテル風

translation.en: Okay. Halston, how long have we known one another?
translation.ja: 僕たちは知り合ってどれくらいだ？

translation.en: Uh-oh.
translation.ja: おっと

translation.en: I love you like family.
translation.ja: 君のことは好きだが考えが甘すぎる

translation.en: But what you're describing costs money, and I happen to know you don't got any.
translation.ja: 君のことは好きだが考えが甘すぎる 予算オーバーだ

translation.en: -Not true! Not true. -Mmm.
translation.ja: そんなはずはない

translation.en: In all of humanity, you're the only one who can do this.
translation.ja: 君にしか任せられない

translation.en: What you did with the Opera Club at the Met…
translation.ja: オペラクラブは？

translation.en: That cost a zillion dollars.
translation.ja: 莫大な金額がかかってる

translation.en: You're the only one who can do it.
translation.ja: 君じゃないとダメなんだ

translation.en: You made fucking Key West fashionable, Angelo.
translation.ja: ど田舎の街もおしゃれに変えただろ

translation.en: [sighs] Halston, you can't afford me.
translation.ja: 君は僕を雇えない

translation.en: Well, can't you do it at cost?
translation.ja: 材料費でやってくれ

translation.en: It's like your ears don't work.
translation.ja: 話にならない

translation.en: Look, I'm giving you the opportunity to have the cream of New York society
translation.ja: この仕事はまたとないチャンスになる

translation.en: coming through these doors and looking at this place going,
translation.ja: 部屋に入った人はこう言うよ

translation.en: "Oh, it's spectacular. Who designed it?"
translation.ja: “すごい デザイナーは誰？”

translation.en: God as my witness, that's worth more than whatever the Opera Club paid you.
translation.ja: 結果的にはオペラクラブよりプラスになる

translation.en: -Do you mean that? -Have I ever lied to you?
translation.ja: 本当か？ 僕がウソつく？

translation.en: -Okay. -Oh, my hero. My hero!
translation.ja: 分かった 僕のヒーロー！

translation.en: -Knock it off. -So, what do you think?
translation.ja: やめてくれ

translation.en: Someone's in a good mood.
translation.ja: やけにご機嫌だね

translation.en: It's always been my dream to have a showroom with a workshop on another floor.
translation.ja: ショールームのあるサロンを持つのが夢だった

translation.en: And I found it, and I rented it.
translation.ja: 最高の物件を見つけた

translation.en: -Where? -68th and Madison.
translation.ja: 場所は？ 68番通りの角

translation.en: Wait till you see it. Literally wait to see it. It's a mess.
translation.ja: 今は散らかってるから少し待ってて

translation.en: And I found my team. Merry misfits, each and every one of them.
translation.ja: それだけじゃない最高の仲間もそろった

translation.en: [Halston] Joe Eula's gonna be my illustrator. He's fantastic.
translation.ja: イラストレーターはジョー･ユーラ

translation.en: He drew collections for Vogue, for Givenchy, for Coco Chanel.
translation.ja: ジバンシィやシャネルのコレクションを描いてる

translation.en: Chic is hard to capture. It's elusive, but he can do it.
translation.ja: “シック”は絵で表すのが難しいが 彼は見事に描く

translation.en: Why do you need an illustrator?
translation.ja: 役割は何だ？

translation.en: I want to see a whole collection laid out in front of me.
translation.ja: コレクションの絵を並べて見たい

translation.en: "Get rid of that. Lower that neckline."
translation.ja: “ボツ　首元を下げて”

translation.en: It's a very intimate relationship between a designer and his illustrator.
translation.ja: イラストレーターとデザイナーの関係は重要だ

translation.en: Joe's more of like a second brain, but stop breaking my train of thought.
translation.ja: いわば僕の右腕さ 話を遮らないで

translation.en: -Sorry. -Elsa Peretti.
translation.ja: ごめん エルサ･ペレッティ

translation.en: She's gonna be my fit model. She's Italian.
translation.ja: イタリア人のモデルだ

translation.en: Comes from money, but she's left all that behind.
translation.ja: 裕福な家から独り立ちした

translation.en: She's stunning. You can't take your eyes off her.
translation.ja: 見とれるほどの美人だよ

translation.en: Some models just wear clothes. Elsa, she makes them her own.
translation.ja: エルサは服を自分のものにする

translation.en: -I thought Liza was your muse? -Well, you can't have too many muses.
translation.ja: ミューズはライザだろ？ ミューズは１人

translation.en: Don't be jealous, Ed.
translation.ja: ヤキモチやくなよ

translation.en: Then there's this kid, Schumacher.
translation.ja: ジョエル･シューマカー

translation.en: He does the windows at Paraphernalia. He'll bring me that young attitude.
translation.ja: 刺激を受けるため若いデザイナーを入れた

translation.en: -Excuse me. Did you do this? -Yes.
translation.ja: 失礼　君が設置した？ はい

translation.en: -Did you do this? -Yes. I…
translation.ja: ドレスのデザインも？

translation.en: [Halston] The team's all in place. Last thing I need to do is find the money.
translation.ja: メンバーはそろったあとは資金だ

translation.en: Last? I'd have thought that's the first thing you had to do.
translation.ja: 最初に用意すべきだろ

translation.en: I just need a teensy-weensy million dollars.
translation.ja: ほんの100万ドルでいい

translation.en: A million dollars?
translation.ja: 100万ドル？

translation.en: The idea was to go to the rich husbands of my old clients at Bergdorf's and ask them.
translation.ja: バーグドルフの時の顧客に出資を頼んでみる

translation.en: Arthur Vanderbilt, Charles Engelhard, Baron de Rothschild.
translation.ja: Ａ･ヴァンダービルトやＣ･エンゲルハード

translation.en: And how did that work out?
translation.ja: それで 返事は？

translation.en: Well, they didn't say no.
translation.ja: まだ断られてない

translation.en: Anyway, I'm not worried.
translation.ja: 心配はしてない

translation.en: Tomorrow I have a meeting with Estelle Marsh. She's the wife of a Texas oil baron.
translation.ja: 明日は石油王の妻のエステル･マーシュに会う

translation.en: Don't look at me like that. I've got this sewn up.
translation.ja: そんな目で見るなうまくやるよ

translation.en: [Halston] Mrs. Marsh, when was the last time anyone asked you,
translation.ja: マーシュさん 最後にこう聞かれたのはいつですか？

translation.en: really asked you
translation.ja: 最後にこう聞かれたのはいつですか？

translation.en: what you need?
translation.ja: “何が欲しい？”

translation.en: When I was at Bergdorf's, I'd have my ladies sit in my chair,
translation.ja: 僕が接客する時には毎回 聞きます

translation.en: and I'd say, "Tell me your troubles. What's bothering you? What do you need?"
translation.ja: “お困り事は？何がご入用ですか？”と

translation.en: Such a small question which would almost without fail be met with, well,
translation.ja: すると高確率で答えが返ってきますが

translation.en: at first, a little sorrow.
translation.ja: まず出るのはため息

translation.en: Because so few people in their lives, especially the men, ever thought to ask them that.
translation.ja: 大半の男性は女性にそのような質問をしません

translation.en: The way my ex-husband used to put it was, "What the fuck do you want?"
translation.ja: 元夫は“何をやれば気が済む？”と

translation.en: Mrs. Marsh.
translation.ja: マーシュさん

translation.en: Did you ever visit Balenciaga in Paris for Made to Order?
translation.ja: バレンシアガのサロンに行かれたことは？

translation.en: Come.
translation.ja: こちらへ

translation.en: Balenciaga loves making women feel afraid.
translation.ja: 彼は女性を怖がらせて楽しんでる

translation.en: When you climb the stairs to his atelier,
translation.ja: アトリエの階段を上ると

translation.en: you're met by a very stern secretary who makes you feel unimportant, even ugly.
translation.ja: 不機嫌な顔をした秘書がいます 歓迎されてないみじめな気持ちになる

translation.en: That won't happen here.
translation.ja: ここは違います

translation.en: This will be the lounge, where you'll take a breath,
translation.ja: こちらは待合室 一息ついてご要望をお聞かせください

translation.en: let go, tell us what you need,
translation.ja: 一息ついてご要望をお聞かせください

translation.en: be reminded of what you're capable of.
translation.ja: あなたは大事なお客様です

translation.en: There'll be tea, champagne…
translation.ja: 紅茶やシャンパン

translation.en: Some of our younger staff may even be able to get you marijuana.
translation.ja: ご希望でしたらマリファナもお出しします

translation.en: [Halston] Come.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: Here.
translation.ja: こちらへ

translation.en: This will be the salon.
translation.ja: ここがサロンです

translation.en: I'll have my girls model the latest collection.
translation.ja: 最新作を着たモデルをご覧になり

translation.en: Then you'll choose from those designs,
translation.ja: 好みの服を選んでください

translation.en: and then I'll build your choices to your measurements.
translation.ja: ピッタリのサイズに仕立てます

translation.en: Mrs. Marsh,
translation.ja: マーシュさん

translation.en: because women like Catherine Deneuve, Jackie Kennedy,
translation.ja: カトリーヌ･ドヌーヴやジャクリーン･ケネディ

translation.en: you custom order your clothing here, within five years,
translation.ja: そしてあなたがここで服をオーダーする

translation.en: Halston Limited will be picked up by every reputable department store in the United States.
translation.ja: ホルストンは５年以内に有名ブランドに成長します

translation.en: I'm gonna change the face of American fashion.
translation.ja: アメリカのファッションを変える

translation.en: And it will all be because of you.
translation.ja: それにはあなたの力が必要です

translation.en: You could talk a leopard out of its spots.
translation.ja: 随分と口が達者なのね

translation.en: How much, exactly, are you looking for?
translation.ja: 正確にはいくら必要なの？

translation.en: A million dollars.
translation.ja: 100万ドルです

translation.en: I'll give you 100,000.
translation.ja: 10万ドル出す

translation.en: Oh, and you're gonna hire my son, Michael.
translation.ja: 息子のマイケルも雇ってちょうだい

translation.en: He's handy.
translation.ja: 役に立つわ

translation.en: He can do all sorts of work. He could even model.
translation.ja: 仕事はできるしモデルもやる

translation.en: Deal.
translation.ja: ぜひ

translation.en: Thank you, Mrs. Marsh. Thank you. Come. Let's have tea.
translation.ja: ご協力 感謝します お茶にしましょう

translation.en: This is fucking terrible. Who made this one?
translation.ja: 最悪だ　誰が作った？

translation.en: I did.
translation.ja: 僕です

translation.en: Don't take this the wrong way, but that's the worst fucking dress I've ever seen.
translation.ja: こんなにダサいドレスは初めて見た

translation.en: Looks like a prom dress, but for a Martian.
translation.ja: まるで火星人のプロム衣装だ

translation.en: -[woman] Dai, Halston. -Okay, Halston, easy.
translation.ja: 〈ホルストン〉 落ち着けよ

translation.en: Don't "easy" me, Joe. We have a fucking show in two weeks. These designs are shit.
translation.ja: 本番は２週間後なのにドレスは最低の出来だ

translation.en: I think if she had a nice, big piece of chunky jewelry--
translation.ja: 大ぶりのジュエリーをつければ…

translation.en: We're not selling jewelry, Elsa! We're selling dresses to human women.
translation.ja: 売るのはドレスで客は人間の女性だ

translation.en: -Take it off. -Maybe in the right color?
translation.ja: 脱いで 色を変える？

translation.en: You do not get to talk.
translation.ja: 君は意見するな

translation.en: Joel, these designs are not working. You must be able to see that.
translation.ja: 良し悪しの判断くらいしてくれ

translation.en: -Sorry. -No, don't say sorry. Do better.
translation.ja: はい マシな仕事しろ

translation.en: Halston, please! You're mad at yourself and taking it out on the kid.
translation.ja: 君はジョエルに八つ当たりしてる

translation.en: I cannot do this all on my own, everybody!
translation.ja: 僕１人じゃできない

translation.en: I didn't hire you so that I could do all the work myself.
translation.ja: だから君たちを雇ったのに

translation.en: -That's what's happening! -Why don't we take a break?
translation.ja: 意味がない 休憩しよう

translation.en: Because we haven't got time.
translation.ja: 休む時間はない

translation.en: There's not one of these designs I would put my name to. Not one.
translation.ja: ホルストンの名で売れる物が１つもない

translation.en: The fucking embarrassment.
translation.ja: とんだ恥さらしだ

translation.en: Where's the suede trench coat?
translation.ja: スエードのコートは？

translation.en: Uh… Yeah, just one second.
translation.ja: 用意します

translation.en: What happened?
translation.ja: この染みは？

translation.en: Um… Well, this is stupid. It was raining today.
translation.ja: さっき 雨に降られました

translation.en: Who wore it out in the rain?
translation.ja: 誰が外で着た？

translation.en: It's a trench coat, Halston.
translation.ja: 普通 着るでしょ

translation.en: I… I did.
translation.ja: 僕が着ました

translation.en: Suede is not waterproof, as it turns out, and it just…
translation.ja: 生地が防水じゃなかった だからこのとおりもう使えません

translation.en: As you can see, it's just not going to work.
translation.ja: だからこのとおりもう使えません

translation.en: Well, the cut's fantastic. Look at it.
translation.ja: 形はすごく美しい

translation.en: It's just the wrong material, but it's the right idea.
translation.ja: 生地を変えれば使える

translation.en: No, suede is not waterproof.
translation.ja: スエードは防水じゃない

translation.en: But it is the right idea.
translation.ja: 確かに形はいい

translation.en: No one else is doing that. I wanted that. I wanted that…
translation.ja: 今までにないデザインで

translation.en: that sensation.
translation.ja: 官能的だ

translation.en: Everyone knows suede is not waterproof.
translation.ja: スエードが水に弱いのは常識だよ

translation.en: I know, Halston. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: Schumacher, you're a junior partner, right?
translation.ja: シューマカー 君はホルストンのジュニアパートナーだ

translation.en: -That's your title. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 君はホルストンのジュニアパートナーだ はい

translation.en: Do you think you're earning that title as of now?
translation.ja: 見合う仕事ができてるか？

translation.en: It's a simple yes or no question.
translation.ja: 単純な質問だ

translation.en: Are you earning the title of junior partner
translation.ja: ジュニアパートナーにふさわしい？

translation.en: right now?
translation.ja: どうだ？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: いいえ

translation.en: Oh fuck.
translation.ja: クソっ

translation.en: [Joe] Halston.
translation.ja: ホルストン

translation.en: [Joel] Jesus!
translation.ja: 誰だ？

translation.en: Sorry, thought I locked it. Sorry.
translation.ja: 失礼　鍵をかけたかと

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何をしてる？

translation.en: I was just taking a second to collect my thoughts.
translation.ja: 頭の中を整理してました

translation.en: [Halston] No. What are you doing?
translation.ja: 違う　それは？

translation.en: Is it heroin?
translation.ja: ヘロインか？

translation.en: No. No, it's… it's just speed.
translation.ja: 違います　覚せい剤です

translation.en: How often do you do that?
translation.ja: 頻繁にやってる？

translation.en: Not-- I'm-- I don't know, every…
translation.ja: そうでもありません

translation.en: Every day?
translation.ja: 毎日？

translation.en: No, not always.
translation.ja: やらない日も

translation.en: You shoot speed every day?
translation.ja: 毎日 打ってる？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: まあ

translation.en: Yes, I do.
translation.ja: そうです

translation.en: With all the work we're doing, it's…
translation.ja: 仕事がキツくて

translation.en: So, you started doing this when you came to work for me?
translation.ja: 僕の元で働き始めてから？

translation.en: No. No.
translation.ja: 違います

translation.en: It's just a thing I do.
translation.ja: 昔からです

translation.en: You know, it keeps me focused. It's… It's how I get into the groove.
translation.ja: 集中力が上がるし気分が乗るんです

translation.en: Do I need to do something here? Take you somewhere?
translation.ja: 僕がすべきことはあるか？

translation.en: Do I need to be worried?
translation.ja: 深刻な状態か？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: いいえ

translation.en: I… I don't know.
translation.ja: 分かりません

translation.en: I… I don't belong here, do I?
translation.ja: 僕はチームの一員じゃない

translation.en: I think we're… we're all a bit like little ships lost at sea.
translation.ja: 僕たちは同じ船に乗って海をさまよっている

translation.en: We've all been through a lot.
translation.ja: 皆 苦労してきた

translation.en: Left our families, been rejected one way or another.
translation.ja: 家族を捨てたり捨てられたり

translation.en: Bunch of queers and freaks and girls who haven't grown up yet.
translation.ja: 変わり者の男と未熟な女の集まりだ

translation.en: I think you belong here.
translation.ja: 君も同類だよ

translation.en: You're very talented, Joel, but there's too much at stake here.
translation.ja: 君には才能があるが危うさもある

translation.en: I think you can see that.
translation.ja: 分かるだろ？

translation.en: If you wanna keep working for me, you gotta get clean.
translation.ja: 働きたいならクスリをやめろ

translation.en: I do. I mean, I will.
translation.ja: 分かりました　やめます

translation.en: It's just--
translation.ja: ただ

translation.en: When you bite my head off about the designs--
translation.ja: あなたに怒鳴られると…

translation.en: If you stop shooting speed,
translation.ja: 君がクスリをやめたら

translation.en: I'll stop biting your head off.
translation.ja: もう怒鳴らない

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
translation.ja: いいな？

translation.en: Halston.
translation.ja: ホルストン

translation.en: There's something I wanna show you.
translation.ja: 見せたい物があります

translation.en: I didn't show you because I thought you'd get mad, but…
translation.ja: さっきは怖くて出せなかったけど

translation.en: it might be good.
translation.ja: いい出来です

translation.en: How did you make it?
translation.ja: どうやった？

translation.en: Uh, just in my kitchen.
translation.ja: 家の台所で手染めしました

translation.en: -Boiling dyes on the stove. -Oh, I love it.
translation.ja: 家の台所で手染めしました すばらしい

translation.en: No one's doing this.
translation.ja: 初めて見る

translation.en: So modern, sensual.
translation.ja: モダンで官能的

translation.en: Here, help me find the middle of the length.
translation.ja: 半分に折る　手伝ってくれ

translation.en: Okay. Lay it down.
translation.ja: よし　置いて

translation.en: Scissors, someone.
translation.ja: 誰か ハサミを

translation.en: Thank you, Joe.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Elsa, come.
translation.ja: エルサ こちらへ

translation.en: Now.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: Lose that.
translation.ja: 外して

translation.en: There's something there.
translation.ja: こうじゃない

translation.en: Joel, just pin down this edge
translation.ja: 端を仮止めして

translation.en: and bring these two edges together in a diagonal going right down.
translation.ja: 足元に向かって斜めに留めるんだ

translation.en: Now, what about the lengths, Joe?
translation.ja: ジョー 丈はどうだ？

translation.en: I'm thinking lower.
translation.ja: 長くしようと思う

translation.en: Maybe bring up the hem.
translation.ja: 少し切って

translation.en: [Halston] Yeah, let me see.
translation.ja: そうだな

translation.en: Now.
translation.ja: どうだ？

translation.en: Che bello.
translation.ja: 〈きれい〉

translation.en: Something's not right.
translation.ja: 何かが違う

translation.en: It's the hair.
translation.ja: 髪型ね

translation.en: Et voilà.
translation.ja: 〈どう？〉

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: いいぞ

translation.en: Now. Walk.
translation.ja: よし 歩いてみて

translation.en: [Halston] Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Oh, they loved it! I think they loved it.
translation.ja: 成功だよな？皆 気に入ってた

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.ja: 何だよ

translation.en: -Well, Halston, these are not bad. -They're not good.
translation.ja: 評判は悪くない 良くもない

translation.en: Yes, this one is.
translation.ja: いいのがあった

translation.en: Senti. "Effortless and elegant,
translation.ja: “エフォートレスで上品”

translation.en: Halston is an exciting new voice in women's fashion."
translation.ja: “女性ファッションに吹く新しい風”

translation.en: Well…
translation.ja: これは？

translation.en: "The look they've assembled here is thrown together or contrived."
translation.ja: “彼のドレスは急ごしらえで不自然”

translation.en: Well, which is it, Bernadine Morris? Thrown together or contrived?
translation.ja: バーナディーン･モリスめどのドレスだ？

translation.en: This one says, "'You're either young or old,' says Halston."
translation.ja: “若すぎるか年配かのどちらかだ”と

translation.en: Well, that's neither good nor bad. That's just a quote.
translation.ja: それは僕の言葉の引用だ

translation.en: He never ever gets to talk.
translation.ja: 発言させるな

translation.en: A collection isn't a success until there are orders.
translation.ja: 注文数で結果が決まる

translation.en: How many orders do we have, Joel?
translation.ja: 何件来てる？

translation.en: Not many.
translation.ja: 多くない

translation.en: Correct. Zero. Which is, yes, not many.
translation.ja: ゼロだから“多くない”よな

translation.en: Well, on to the next collection.
translation.ja: 次のショーがある

translation.en: What? There won't be a next collection.
translation.ja: 次なんかない

translation.en: This was fucking it. We're $200,000 in debt.
translation.ja: 20万ドルも借金してる

translation.en: We haven't paid the rent. In two weeks, they'll turn the lights out.
translation.ja: 賃料も払ってないしじきに電気も止まる

translation.en: Well, if we're talking about money, you could maybe spend less on orchids.
translation.ja: ランの花を買うのをやめたら？

translation.en: That is missing the thrust of what I'm saying, and orchids are part of my process.
translation.ja: 論点がずれてるしランの花は重要だ

translation.en: Can't put a budget on inspiration.
translation.ja: カネに代えられない価値がある

translation.en: I'll get it.
translation.ja: 出るわ

translation.en: Pronto, Halston Limited.
translation.ja: 〈こちらホルストンです〉

translation.en: Why does he always leave when I raise my voice?
translation.ja: 大声を出すと毎回出ていく

translation.en: -Am I that abrasive? -You want me to answer that question?
translation.ja: 不快なのか？ 答えてほしい？

translation.en: -[Elsa] Halston. -Who is it? Do they have any money?
translation.ja: 出て 誰だ？　出資か？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: もしもし

translation.en: Oh, hi.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: You forgot to flush the toilet.
translation.ja: トイレを流し忘れてる

translation.en: It's 'cause… um…
translation.ja: それは…

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: Come here.
translation.ja: 座って

translation.en: We had a deal.
translation.ja: 約束したよな？

translation.en: I'm under way too much pressure to be having a junkie on my team.
translation.ja: ヤク中をチームに置いておけない

translation.en: It's so much stress.
translation.ja: ストレスだ

translation.en: I know. How… how can you even handle it?
translation.ja: どうやって耐えてるんですか？

translation.en: Because it only takes one person,
translation.ja: たった１人でいい

translation.en: one socialite to change everything.
translation.ja: １人の著名人が全てを変える

translation.en: If I can get my designs on the one right person,
translation.ja: その人に僕のドレスを着てもらえれば

translation.en: I can get them on every woman in America.
translation.ja: アメリカ中の女性に広まる

translation.en: It just takes one "yes"
translation.ja: １回の“イエス”でいい

translation.en: from the most sophisticated socialite in New York City,
translation.ja: ニューヨークで１番洗練された人のね

translation.en: and I just got off the phone with her.
translation.ja: たった今 それが聞けた

translation.en: Babe Paley just called, and she wants to see our collection.
translation.ja: ベーブ･ペイリーが僕のコレクションを見たいと

translation.en: Babe Paley? Are you serious?
translation.ja: ベーブ･ペイリーが？

translation.en: Yes. Now get your fucking shit together.
translation.ja: そうだよ分かったらしっかりしろ

translation.en: No, I didn't say that. No, no, no.
translation.ja: そんなこと言ってない

translation.en: No, no. It's… it's just my takeout.
translation.ja: あれは僕の記事だよ

translation.en: I mean, I love Liza. You know I do.
translation.ja: ライザ 君を愛してる

translation.en: But I don't think I can sit through another Liza with a "Z."
translation.ja: でもあのショーは見てられない

translation.en: I know. All right, honey. I'll let you go.
translation.ja: だろ？ そろそろ切る

translation.en: Ciao, ciao.
translation.ja: チャオ

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
translation.ja: 聞いていいか？

translation.en: What's going on here?
translation.ja: どういうことだ？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.ja: 何が？

translation.en: The past few weeks, I haven't seen you smile.
translation.ja: 数週間 笑顔もなかったのに

translation.en: You dress different. You're… You're talking different, for God's sake.
translation.ja: 突然 服装や髪型話し方まで変わってる

translation.en: I could be more to you.
translation.ja: 僕は置いてけぼり

translation.en: Is this not working?
translation.ja: 気に入らない？

translation.en: No, it's just that I…
translation.ja: そうじゃない

translation.en: We see each other two, three nights a week?
translation.ja: 僕たちは週に３日会ってる

translation.en: And I still don't feel like I really know you.
translation.ja: なのに君をよく知らない

translation.en: That's all. I wanna know you.
translation.ja: もっと知りたい

translation.en: I think you know me very well, Ed.
translation.ja: よく知ってると思うよ

translation.en: "I think you know me very well, Ed." What is it with the voice?
translation.ja: “よく知ってると思う”その声のトーンは？

translation.en: -What voice? -That one.
translation.ja: 何のこと？ それだ

translation.en: You're from Indiana. It's like you're imitating somebody.
translation.ja: 誰かのまねをしてる

translation.en: I am not.
translation.ja: してない

translation.en: I take offense to that. I've always been this person.
translation.ja: ずっと前からこうだった

translation.en: If anyone in this room has changed, it's you.
translation.ja: 変わったのは君の方だ

translation.en: -Me? -Yes, I make you insecure.
translation.ja: 僕？ 僕の夢を聞いて不安になった

translation.en: My ambition.
translation.ja: 僕の夢を聞いて不安になった

translation.en: Didn't use to be the case, but it obviously is now.
translation.ja: 前までは平気だったのに

translation.en: Looking for things to pick at. My voice? Good Lord.
translation.ja: 今は声にまで文句を言う

translation.en: Well, all right. I don't wanna argue.
translation.ja: 分かったよ言い争いたくない

translation.en: I don't either.
translation.ja: 僕もだ

translation.en: I think I'll turn in.
translation.ja: もう寝る

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: I'd like to sleep alone.
translation.ja: １人で寝たい

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.ja: 美しい

translation.en: Stunning, actually.
translation.ja: 本当に見事だわ

translation.en: But I can't wear them every day.
translation.ja: でも毎日は着られない

translation.en: -You're… you're interested in every day? -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: 平服をお探しですか？

translation.en: Then let me show you something I've been developing.
translation.ja: ちょうどいい物があります

translation.en: Elsa.
translation.ja: エルサ

translation.en: I call it Ultrasuede.
translation.ja: ウルトラスエードです

translation.en: I was working a lot with suede, which I adore. But wear it in the rain and it's ruined.
translation.ja: スエードは美しい生地ですが水に弱い

translation.en: So, it occurred to me, I should create my own.
translation.ja: そこで新しい生地を作りました

translation.en: This is a new synthetic.
translation.ja: 最新の合成皮革です

translation.en: You can throw it in the wash. You can dress it up.
translation.ja: 上品ながら洗濯可能な手軽さもある

translation.en: You can wear it to lunch. You can take the kids to school in it.
translation.ja: どんなシーンでも活躍します

translation.en: It's sexy. It's comfort.
translation.ja: セクシーで快適

translation.en: It's freedom.
translation.ja: まさに自由です

translation.en: I'll take one in every color.
translation.ja: 全色もらうわ

translation.en: ♪ Everybody is a star ♪
translation.ja: スティーブン･ゲインズ著「Simply Halston」に基づく

translation.en: ♪ Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh ♪
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　菊池 花奈美
